name: Craft Academy
description: 16 week software development bootcamp featuring a full stack curriculum including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Ruby, Rails and more. Focused on teaching devs to utilize a test-driven approach to development, using tools such as RSpec, Node, Cucumber and Cypress.  Heavy focus on collaboration and pair-programming - each week features a new project/problem set to complete with 60+hour workload full of live demos, coding sessions and real-world client/app interaction.

name: Asylum Entertainment
description: Managed multi-million dollar budget for Facebook’s “Big Chicken Shaq” featuring Shaquille O’Neal, in addition to PMing daily shoots on location in Las Vegas.

name: A&E
description: Production Manager, Asylum Entertainment – A&E’s “Autobiography” Shot on location in various major US cities following the trials and tribulations of various athletes, public figures and celebrities as told through their own voices. Also produced casting, locations & logistics for recreation shoots.
